data.comment: Today's referee, Benoit Millot, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Benoit Millot, has blown to start the match.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Millot blows for offside.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Nice.
Throw-in for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux's Youssouf Sabaly gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nice needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
Nice have a goal kick.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Bordeaux.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bordeaux's Hwang Ui-Jo is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Samuel Kalu (Bordeaux) gets a yellow card.
Adam Ounas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nice.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Nicolas De Preville.
That's a fine assist from Toma Basic.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match at Matmut Atlantique has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pablo Castro, who is down injured.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice.
Bordeaux’s Pablo Castro is on his feet again at Matmut Atlantique.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Benoit Millot waits before resuming play because Pablo Castro for Bordeaux is still down.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Paulo Sousa (Bordeaux) has taken off Pablo Castro who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Vukasin Jovanovic is the replacement.
Free kick in a good position for Nice!
Nice drives forward and Riza Durmisi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Bordeaux.
At Matmut Atlantique, Kephren Thuram Ulien has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Bordeaux drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bordeaux to check on Pierre Lees-Melou, who is grimacing with pain.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Pierre Lees-Melou has recovered and rejoins the match in Bordeaux.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice's Alexis Claude-Maurice misses with an attempt on goal.
Benoit Millot awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
Ruben Pardo of Bordeaux smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nice's Dante has been booked in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Millot awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice.
Nice pushes forward through Alexis Claude-Maurice, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Adam Ounas. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Nice have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Nice's Pierre Lees-Melou breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Bordeaux.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Benoit Millot blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Matmut Atlantique.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Benoit Millot signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Nice's half.
Throw-in for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
Samuel Kalu (Bordeaux) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Goal kick for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Free kick Nice.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Enock Kwateng (Bordeaux) has received a first yellow card.
Adam Ounas is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Moussa Wague with an assist there.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Bordeaux.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Benoit Millot signals a Nice throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Bordeaux.
Remi Oudin is replacing Ruben Pardo for the home team.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a throw-in for Nice, close to Bordeaux's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
The away team have replaced Kephren Thuram Ulien with Arnaud Lusamba. This is the first substitution made today by Patrick Vieira.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Free kick Nice.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
Bordeaux make their third substitution with Josh Maja replacing Samuel Kalu.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Nice.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
Nicolas De Preville hits the post with a header! Very nearly a goal there for Bordeaux in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
Bordeaux are pushing forward but Hwang Ui-Jo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Nice at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago is on a sub for Kasper Dolberg for Nice.
Throw-in Nice.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Toma Basic (Bordeaux) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Attention is being given to Nice’s Riza Durmisi and play has been suspended briefly.
It seems as if Riza Durmisi is unable to continue. Stanley N`Soki replaces him for the away team.
Throw-in for Nice close to the penalty box.
Benoit Millot signals a Nice throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Can Nice capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bordeaux's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Bordeaux attack but Josh Maja's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Bordeaux are in shooting range from this free kick.
Benoit Millot awards Nice a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Bordeaux. The final score is 1-1.
Malang Sarr (Nice) has received a yellow card from Benoit Millot.
